name: Perception (itch) (Littlebath)
description:
Perception is a game that is a research exploration of level design in Non-Euclidean spaces. You have to navigate and solve puzzles in a sprawling and confusing environment. Savor this calm and serene mood as you explore the interconnected rooms. 

The game is for my university's final year project. You can follow all my progress in my devlogs.
